programs.title: Introduction to Python
programs.description: A beginner-friendly course covering Python basics including variables, loops, functions, and modules to build a strong programming foundation.

programs.title: Web Development with JavaScript
programs.description: Learn how to build dynamic web pages using JavaScript, from DOM manipulation to working with APIs and asynchronous code.

programs.title: Data Science Fundamentals
programs.description: An introductory data science program that teaches how to analyze data, visualize insights, and apply basic machine learning techniques using Python.

programs.title: React for Beginners
programs.description: Get started with React, the most popular JavaScript library for building interactive user interfaces, including hooks and routing.

programs.title: Full-Stack Development
programs.description: A comprehensive course that takes you through backend and frontend technologies to create, connect, and deploy full-stack applications.
